div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1610 Palestine, before 1941 Burial: after 86 B.C. (Spaer) Contents: 34+ AR Antiochus VII: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Antiochus VIII: 1 tetradr. (Ace, as NNM 84, no. 35) Aradus: 32 tetradr. Dis position: A. Spaer, Jerusalem Information from A. Spaer. Latest date at Aradus yr. 173 = 87/6 B.C. The two Seleucid coins may be intrusive
